entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
